about_alt: A young man wearing a black shirt and dark pants, sitting on a chair. He is holding a black electric guitar and looking at the camera with a serious expression. The background is neutral, with soft lighting and a dark backdrop.
about_me_description_2: When I'm not immersed in code, you'll probably find me with a guitar in hand, running outdoors, playing video games, or diving into a good book or manga. These moments help expand my creativity, bringing new perspectives and innovative solutions to the projects I work on.
about_me_description: Since I was young, I have always been passionate about technology, and today I have the opportunity to express my creativity by doing what I love. I hold a degree in Computer Science from Centro Universitário Cesuca. Over the past {{year}} years, I have been developing and refining my programming skills, focusing on front-end solutions. I have solid experience with technologies such as React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, among others.
access_this_project_on_the_internet: Access this project on the internet
achievements_description: In October 2023, my team, Absolem Coders, won the Local People's Choice award from the Federal Institute of Paraná (IFPR) in Curitiba during the 2023 NASA Space Apps Challenge, the world's largest hackathon.
avatar_alt: A young man smiling, wearing glasses and a black jacket, with a starry sky background. He is looking slightly to the right, with a friendly and confident expression.
